name: PATIENT_ALIAS
description: The PATIENT_ALIAS table contains the aliases and soundex data for your patients. Each patient may have multiple aliases; therefore, a line number is used to uniquely identify each alias for a patient.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID number assigned to the patient record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number associated with the alias information associated with this row. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this row.

columns.name: ALIAS
columns.description: The alias on the patient record.
